blocks.demand_response_integrates_text: Lumin integrates with SolarEdge and Enphase to extend the life of energy storage systems during outages and normal use.

blocks.question_subtitle|raw: Here you can find answers to the most common questions about Lumin and our products. Where did the company name come from? What professional certificates does the system have, and much more.
